Created an attachment (id=46840)
org.eclipse.pde.ui.patch

Looks like we just need some cleverly placed null guards. Looks good from here.
patch released.  2 for Chris in one day.

> Looks like we just need some cleverly placed null guards.
Either that or support for hyperlinks in those not-yet-so-clever editors... ;-)

BTW: I assume the patch also solves the NPE in the schema (.exsd) editor:
